isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING PUMP: VICKERS (LUK) V10NF AND V20NF - ASSEMBLE

svcsubsecinfo.para: Coat all parts with approved power steering fluid, assemble and provide initial lubrication. Refer to GROUP 10 - LUBRICATION section of the CTS-5000 Master Service Manual. Use small amounts of petroleum jelly to hold O-rings in place during assembly.

note.para: The shipping and handling of the precision parts may result in burrs on the sharp edges. All sharp edges on the cartridge parts kit should be stoned prior to installation.

svcproc.title: FLOW CONTROL COVER
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 9 for all Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Assemble the snap ring (Item 8) in place within the bore (early design only); seat firmly in the groove.
Insert the valve (Item 5) in the bore, small end first.
Install the spring (Item 4) and both plugs. Use new O-rings if straight thread plugs are used.
